descriptionHtml:
This mod changes Glass related items to \'Malachite\', as the name suggests. It changes the armors, the weapons, the puzzle claw thing (For the dungeons.... you know the one) and the name of the \'Glass Smithing\' Perk. Only the names have been changed and NOT the IDs, so there shouldn\'t be any incompatibility issues.

I know absolutely abysmally little about modding, so go easy on me. Never uploaded a mod before either.

I made this mod for ME. I felt like having weapons and armor made from glass just sounded silly. These items are actually made from malachite ingots so I wondered why that was not their name. Now it is :)

Like I said... I made this for ME. Whatever changes this mod makes that you don\'t like... not my problem. I will make any fixes that need to happen but that\'s about it I\'m afraid.

NOTE: The mod I am using to make the Glass sword look the way it does in the image is: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33602/

Anyway... here it is if you want it. -Makaro
author: Makaro
